alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 08 at 9:47PM MDT until May 09 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Utah and northwest, southwest and west central Colorado. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Tavaputs Plateau
